PageWidgetPortable.Title: Relação de Tarefas
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <SimpleGridAttributes> <EntityViewName>CRM_TAREFAS.CUSTOM.GRID</EntityViewName> <CanDelete>true</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>true</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>true</CanInsert> <DefaultFilterName>PADRAO</DefaultFilterName> <UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible>false</UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible> <Mode>1</Mode> <UserDefinedPageSize>10</UserDefinedPageSize> <SystemFilterOnly>false</SystemFilterOnly> <DisplayRowCommand>true</DisplayRowCommand> <CompanyFilterMode>1</CompanyFilterMode> <UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause>A.EMPRESA = @EMPRESA AND ( A.ACAORELACIONAMENTO IS NULL AND A.OPORTUNIDADE IS NULL OR (A.STATUS <> 1) ) </UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause> <FormUrl>~/PortalCRM/a/CRM_TAREFAS/Form.aspx</FormUrl> <UserDefinedDisableRowSelection>false</UserDefinedDisableRowSelection> </SimpleGridAttributes>
